mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PEN_ID) AS COUNT FROM PENSION

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.PEN_ID , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , A.PEN_IMAGE , IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(R.REV_STAR),0), ' ') AS STAR , COUNT(R.REV_NUM) AS RV , (SELECT IFNULL( MIN(CAST(RM_PRICE AS UNSIGNED)) , 0) FROM PENSION_ROOM WHERE PEN_ID = P.PEN_ID) AS RM_PRICE
FROM PENSION P LEFT OUTER JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON A.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID WHERE 1=1
AND PEN_NAME LIKE '%${pen_name}%'
AND PEN_ADDRESS LIKE '%${pen_address}%'
GROUP BY P.PEN_ID, P.PEN_NAME, A.PEN_IMAGE
ORDER BY COUNT(R.REV_NUM) DESC
ORDER BY RM_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY RM_PRICE
) A
LIMIT ${index} , ${amount}

SELECT A.PEN_IMAGE , P.PEN_ID , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(R.REV_STAR),1), ' ') AS STAR FROM PENSION P LEFT OUTER JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON A.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID GROUP BY P.PEN_ID, A.PEN_IMAGE ORDER BY AVG(R.REV_STAR) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PENSION( PEN_ID, USER_ID, PEN_NAME, PEN_ADDRESS, PEN_ZIPCODE, PEN_NUMBER ) VALUES( #{PEN_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{PEN_NAME}, #{PEN_ADDRESS}, #{PEN_ZIPCODE}, #{PEN_NUMBER})

INSERT INTO PENSION_ROOM( PEN_ID, RM_NAME, RM_CHECKIN, RM_CHECKOUT, RM_PRICE, RM_RESABLE_NUM, RES_STATUS ) VALUES
(#{item.PEN_ID}, #{item.RM_NAME}, #{item.RM_CHECKIN}, #{item.RM_CHECKOUT}, #{item.RM_PRICE}, #{item.RM_RESABLE_NUM}, #{item.RES_STATUS})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PENSION_ROOM A JOIN PENSION B ON A.PEN_ID = B.PEN_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
SELECT Count(P.PEN_ID) 'RCOUNT' FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) WHERE P.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
SELECT P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , A.PEN_IMAGE FROM PENSION P JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID WHERE P.PEN_ID = #{PEN_ID};

SELECT R.ROOM_ID , R.RM_PRICE , R.RM_CHECKIN , R.RM_CHECKOUT , RA.RM_NAME , RA.RM_IMAGE , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, #{rm_checkin}, #{rm_checkout}) > 1 THEN CONCAT('예 약 하 기 | ', FORMAT(R.RM_PRICE*TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, #{rm_checkin}, #{rm_checkout}), 0), '원 (', TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, #{rm_checkin}, #{rm_checkout}), '박)') ELSE '예 약 하 기' END AS BOOK FROM PENSION P JOIN PENSION_ROOM R ON P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID JOIN ROOM_ATTACH RA ON R.RM_NAME = RA.RM_NAME WHERE P.PEN_ID = #{pen_id} ORDER BY CONVERT(R.RM_PRICE, SIGNED)
SELECT P.PEN_NAME , PR.RM_NAME , PR.RM_CHECKIN , PR.RM_CHECKOUT , PR.RM_PRICE , P.PEN_ID , P.USER_ID FROM PENSION P JOIN PENSION_ROOM PR ON P.PEN_ID = PR.PEN_ID WHERE PR.ROOM_ID = #{ROOM_ID}

SELECT R.RES_NUMBER , P.PEN_NAME, R.RM_NAME , M.USER_NAME, R.USER_ID , R.CHECK_IN_D, R.CHECK_IN_T , R.CHECK_OUT_D, R.CHECK_OUT_T , R.RES_TIME , R.PEN_ID , R.RM_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) WHERE P.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT R.RES_NUMBER , P.PEN_NAME, R.RM_NAME,PR.RES_STATUS , M.USER_NAME, R.USER_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(R.CHECK_IN_D, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CHECK_IN_D ,DATE_FORMAT(R.CHECK_OUT_D, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CHECK_OUT_D , R.RES_TIME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN PENSION_ROOM PR ON (PR.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) WHERE R.PEN_ID = #{PEN_ID} AND DATE_FORMAT(R.CHECK_IN_D, '%Y-%m-%d') > SYSDATE() AND PR.RES_STATUS = '1'

SELECT A.REV_NUM , A.PEN_ID , A.REV_TITLE , A.REV_CONTENT , A.REV_STAR , A.REV_DATE , A.REPLY , A.ANS_CONTENT , A.ANS_DATE , B.USER_NAME FROM REVIEW A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE WHERE PEN_ID = (SELECT PEN_ID FROM PENSION WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_TYPE='2' AND USER_ID = #{user_id})) ORDER BY REPLY, REV_NUM DESC LIMIT ${index} , ${amount}
SELECT COUNT(REV_NUM) FROM REVIEW WHERE PEN_ID = (SELECT PEN_ID FROM PENSION WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_TYPE='2' AND USER_ID = #{user_id}))

SELECT count(R.RES_NUMBER) RES_NUMBER , sum(R.RM_PRICE) RM_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) WHERE P.USER_ID = #{user_id} and DATE_FORMAT(RES_TIME, 'YY') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), 'YY') AND DATE_FORMAT(RES_TIME, 'MM') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), 'MM') AND RES_STATUS = '1';
